title: Doubt
content: Why there is elephant face besid of pes logo what does it indicate?

comments.body: That's the PES mascot, the mastodon. It also has a name which I've forgotten.
It's called JAGO. It is an activation for something which is promptly forgot after first year orientation ðŸ¥²
Its the mascot. Sometime during my batch...a form went up to choose the mascot and this was it.
Does anyone know the story behind it
